SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: TO EXPOSE YOUNG CHILDREN FROM LOW-INCOME NEIGHBORHOODS TO LITERATURE AND THE BENEFITS OF LITERACY SKILLS BY OPERATING A MOBILE CLASSROOM CALLED STORY BUS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: THE ANIMAL ORCHESTRA EXHIBIT WILL USE ANTHROPOMORPHIC ANIMALS TO ENGAGE CHILDREN IN CLASSICAL MUSIC.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description3Txt: THE VAN GOGH FOR CHILDREN EXHIBIT WILL TOUR ART MUSEUMS AND CHILDREN'S MUSEUMS, AND ENGAGE CHILDREN IN THE IDEA THAT THEY CAN BE ARTISTS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description4Txt: THE KOHL EDUCATION PRIZE HIGHLIGHTS THE WORK OF A LEADER IN THE FIELD OF EDUCATION. THAT LEADER PRESENTS HIS OR HER IDEAS IN FRONT OF AN AUDIENCE OF CHICAGO'S LEADING PHILANTHROPISTS AND BUSINESS OWNERS, TO HELP INFORM THESE LEADERS ABOUT THE CURRENT STATE OF EDUCATION.

SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description1Txt: THE STORYBUS PROGRAM HAS VISITED NUMEROUS PRE-K AND ELEMENTARY SCHOOLS IN TEH CITY OF CHICAGO AND ITS SUBURBS DURING THE YEAR. HUNDREDS, IF NOT THOUSANDS, OF CHILDREN HAVE BEEN PRESENTED WITH MATERIALS THAT EXPOSE THEM TO READING AND LITERATURE TO FOSTER AND ENHANCE THEIR APPREICATION FOR AND THE USES OF LITERARY SKILLS.
SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description2Txt: THE VAN GOGH FOR CHILDREN EXHIBIT WILL TOUR ART MUSEUMS AND CHILDREN'S MUSEUMS AND ENGAGE CHILDREN IN THE IDEA THAT THEY CAN BE ARTISTS.
